Game information:

Lichdom: Battlemage - this charmer from the first person who
gives attention from the magician, whom you have never seen
in the games. With boundless magical powers at your disposal
and cruel enemies around every corner, victory depends on a
combination of skill and strategy. You must carefully handle
a wide range of spells and learn to throw them into the center
of the battle. You - it's your spells! Lichdom: Battlemage
offers a huge range of settings art of magic. Each Mage is a
product he created magic that reflects the style of the game
and will be specific to each. Whether you prefer to destroy
enemies from a safe distance, to wade into battle and show
their strength in the face, or adjust the enemies against
each other, endless customization spell will allow you to
become a magician - so you want to be.


Game Features:

Scour the fallen enemies and collect ingredients for your spells

Connect booty to get items of higher rarity

Select fire, ice, or both, of the 8 categories
of spells - each has its own unique features

Assign spells to "Range", "Scope", "stop" or "Defense"

Use modifiers and power-ups to shape your strategic needs

Improve your arsenal to make the best Fight!

The first game, in full, the empowerment of the magician

Custom spells and unique support hundreds of
hours of gameplay and unpredictability

Incredible engine CryEngine surprise its display

Beautiful scenery and the story plot will provide
a rich and compelling background realism

"You feel absolutely everything" - core design
Xaviant provide players the maximum immersion
